title: Who do you think is the best President in US history? - Tree Hugging Capitalists - Quora

response.answer_text: Washington. He stepped down after two terms, setting a precedent that is law today. One of the best things about the US government is the limitations on it, we could very well be in a much worse place if the same president could lead for an unspecified amount of time. He also played an incredibly important role in the actual creation of the United States, not to mention his military career during the Revolutionary war. It shouldn’t be mandatory or anything, but serving in the armed forces can definitely help build good qualities and habits for a leader.

Without a doubt…..  He saved the United States from being split into two. He liberated 4 million slaves from bondage. He strengthened the economy even introducing a railroad platform. He Strengthen the United States. He is without any doubt….. THE BEST PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 #LincolnForever!! #LongLiveAbrahamLincolnAndTheUnitedStatesOfAmerica!
